summary: Luxury jewelry e-commerce website with marquee banner system
architectural_notes: Banner positioned below header, static location
Support for multiple scrolling messages in marquee

existing_features.title: Create a MarqueeBanner component that displays below the header in a static position (not fixed/sticky). The banner should smoothly scroll enabled messages horizontally in a continuous loop with a gold/beige luxury theme matching the existing brand styling.

Add banner message management interface to the admin dashboard with functionality to add, edit, delete, and reorder multiple banner messages. Include controls for enabling/disabling individual messages.
Integrate the MarqueeBanner component into the Layout component so it appears below the header across all pages of the site.

new_feature_requests.summary: Marquee text banner below header with admin control for multiple messages

Add backend storage and API methods for managing marquee banner messages, including fields for message text, display order, and enabled status. Support CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) for banner messages.
Restrict banner message management API methods to only the admin user with email 'aureliefinejewellery06@gmail.com'. Use the existing admin authorization pattern from the codebase.
